marshall_webapp

Astronomical-transient marshalling webapp for curating and managing streams of object observations generated by wide-field surveys

block_title (function) ∞

block_title(log, title, align='left')[source] ∞

block title

Key Arguments

  • title – the title for the block

  • log – the logger

  • align – False | left | right | center

Return

  • title – the title for the ticket block
